Class Base32.Decoder

java.lang.Object
org.tquadrat.foundation.util.Base32.Decoder
Enclosing class:
Base32
@ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: Base32.java 1060 2023-09-24 19:21:40Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") public static final class Base32.Decoder extends Object

The Decoder for Crockfords's Base 32 format.

Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Thanks to:
Douglas Crockford (douglas@crockford.com)

  • Method Details

    • checkValid

      private final long[] checkValid(byte[] src)
      Checks whether the given argument is a valid Basic 32 sequence and converts it into an array with the symbol values.
      Parameters:
      src - The data to check.
      Returns:
      The symbol values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - The input data is invalid.

    • decode

      public final byte[] decode(byte[] src) throws ValidationException

      Decodes an array of Base 32 symbols.

      This is the converse operation to Base32.Encoder.encode(byte[])

      Parameters:
      src - The input data.
      Returns:
      The decoded value.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - The input data is not a valid Base 32 sequence

    • decode

      public final byte[] decode(String src) throws ValidationException

      Decodes a Base 32 string.

      This is the converse operation to Base32.Encoder.encodeToString(byte[]).

      Parameters:
      src - The input data.
      Returns:
      The decoded value.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - The input data is not a valid Base 32 sequence

      Returns:

    • decodeToNumber

      public final BigInteger decodeToNumber(String src) throws ValidationException

      Decodes a Base  string to a number.

      This is the converse operation to Base32.Encoder.encodeToString(BigInteger).

      Parameters:
      src - The input data.
      Returns:
      The decoded value.
      Throws:
      ValidationException - The input data is not a valid Base 32 sequence

    • decodeToString

      public final String decodeToString(byte[] src) throws ValidationException

      Decodes an array of Base 32 symbols to a String.

      This is the converse operation to Base32.Encoder.encode(String).

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The decoded value.
